name: Battle Playroom
description:
Toys can be so cute. Except when they're at war!
Come join the toy army, and take off to the skies to fend off an invasion of paper planes in intense battles across a giant house!

★ PLAY AS A PLASTIC PLANE ★

You may be made out of plastic, but there's still a warrior inside of you! Take down your foes with your two devastating tube-cannons ready to fire at a moment's notice, and dodge enemy attacks before they take you down!

★ DEFEAT THE EVIL GENERAL ★

From the depths of the basement, an old General resurfaced with desires of vengeance and conquest. Defend your home against his army of paper planes, rescue your captured friends and send him straight back to the basement!

★ INTENSE ACTION-PACKED FUN! ★

With a storyline spread across multiple levels, cute and beautiful environments to behold as you fly by, varied mission objectives and fully voiced dialogues, you're in for a fun time! 

★ KEY FEATURES ★

- Shoot wherever you aim, no matter the direction of your ship
- Enemies taking advantage of the environment to strike from the shadows
- A thrilling final boss of epic proportions
- Fully drawn in-game cutscenes
- Fully voiced character dialogues
- Adjustable difficulty (easy / medium / hard)
- in-game gallery and comics
- Unlockable levels and content as you progress through the game

★ CONTROLS ★

Z/Q/S/D  ➜  Move the plane
Mouse Movement  ➜  Reticle aim
Left Mouse Click  ➜  Shoot
Esc  ➜  Open pause menu in-game
Shift + Alt  ➜  Switch between ZQSD/WASD

★ THE TEAM ★ ✦Programmers✦

Elliott Lefebvre
Axel Pouchin
